stories.text:
I'm trying to find an article that was shared on HN recently that described different types of web applications and the recommended architecture to sue for each type (SPA, PWA, etc.)

I think the article also had a Greek-sounding title.

Thanks.
stories.title: Ask HN: Please help me find an article about when to use web app architectures

stories.text:
Context: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27657610

The US State Department recently released finalized figures for US citizens that died overseas in 2021. Source: https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/international-travel/while-abroad/death-abroad1/death-statistics.html

According to these figures, no US citizens died in Japan between the months of June and December 2021, the time Byuu/Near is supposed to have committed suicide. The press articles at the time made no independent confirmation of the suicide, merely repeating claims from a Twitter user and an anonymous Google docs document.

Byuu/Near is probably still alive.
stories.title: Tell HN: Emulator developer Byuu/Near is probably not dead
DeepMind Researchers Develop 'BYOL-Explore': A Curiosity-Driven Algorithm
Zendesk shares rise 40% on buyout news
